attributes.action: find a new way for elected representatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My MP is useless.
Not personally, he always responds, and does his job well and promptly.
But its his powers, his ability, he can do nothing for me, any issues I have, have never been addressed, again not through his trying but his inablity to effect change.
So I ask that MP's be abolished totally and a new way of representing people so they can make a difference will result.
My MP cannot do a thing to help, whats the point of him then? Plus there are over 600 of the same, very expensive, too for not being able to help at all.
